Trigger An enemy damages, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabs}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapples} your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you

You free an ally from @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restraint}. If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. The ally can attempt to break free of effects grabbing, restraining, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Immobilized]{Immobilizing}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzing} them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Escape]{Escape} from one effect as a free action. If they can move, the ally can Step as a free action, even if they didn't need to escape.
